Package menu

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MenuController
    Contains / controls a menu
    MenuItem
    An item in a menu
    MenuItemControlBase
    A menu item used for changing controls
    MenuItemExit
    Exit menu item
    MenuItemFindGame
    Finds a game
    MenuItemHost
    Hosts a game
    MenuItemLink
    A link between two menu screens
    MenuItemResWidth
    A menu item for changing the screen's width
    MenuItemScanner  
    MenuScreen
    A screen for the menu
